Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: Netizens are taking to social media to voice their thoughts on the upcoming federal budget in Australia. While some have shared recommendations from the Women's Economic Equality Task Force others have criticized the Stage 3 tax cuts which are deemed to be fiscally irresponsible and costly. Some have called for a limit on rents in Australia and urged governments at all levels to follow Sustainable Development Goals. Several people have also expressed disappointment with the actions of the Australian Labor Party while others have made suggestions for budget-saving measures.
